Texts.Chs: 尽管当他们面对不是和他们同一种族的族群时往往显得性情残忍，但结果是无从辩驳的。不论是等离子武器，还是强大又近乎无穷的能源，又或是独特的推进方式都来自绘世者一族的研究。
Texts.Eng: Despite their often cruel disposition when it comes to species not of their lineage, the results cannot be argued against. Plasmic weapons, enhanced and nearly limitless energy sources and unique forms of propulsion are all discoveries owed to the Skathian research methodology.

Texts.Chs: 绘世者一族指定最聪明最敏捷的人作为探索者。这个阶层的人负责探索新的知识和可供繁衍的宜居世界，是绘世者一族中偏向科学与教育的一支。没有探索者，一切都将不再进步。
Texts.Eng: Skath appoint the brightest and quickest on their feet as Seekers. This caste, responsible for seeking out new inhabitable spawn worlds as well as knowledge, are the scientific and educational branch of the Skathian people. Without the Seeker caste, all progress would come to a halt.

Texts.Chs: 绘世者中的一些人认为探索者还有一项更神圣的职责：找到并定位不久前试图灭绝绘世者的种族，并向他们复仇。这个“Volarian族”显然是我们所不知的。这里普遍认为他们是另一个已知的种族，但对绘世者一族来说仍是个谜。
Texts.Eng: Some among the Skath believe the Seekers have one more sacred duty: To seek out and locate the race that attempted to wipe them out not so long ago and bring the vengeance of the Skath against them. These 'Volarians' apparently responsible are unknown to us. The common belief here is that they are another species already known, but whom remain a mystery to the Skath.

Texts.Chs: 探索者的主要任务是改善绘世者一族的生活，即使代价是他人的生命。关于两足动物的实验大多数时候是被禁止的（事实上，对于绘世者而言多数实验都从这里起步），这也是他们不被允许加入保护国联盟的主要原因之一。但是，他们加入了不结盟世界联盟。
Texts.Eng: The primary mission of the Seeker caste is the betterment of Skathian life, even at the expense of other lives. Experimentation on other bipedal species is rarely off-the-table (in fact, most research *starts* here for the Skath) and is one of the primary reasons they were not permitted to join the Protectorate. They have instead joined the League of Non-Aligned Worlds.
